==== RCSI Meeting ====
Deejoe, Hal14550, Carl and cprofitt of from Rochester attended the RCSI Linux SIG meeting. The discussions included the following topics:
* Backup and recovery options for Linux systems
* Wallpaper programs that rotate wallpaper images
* Providing Linux systems to low-income families and community centers
* The Ubuntu Global Bug Jam
* The Upcoming LoCo presentation on MythTV at the Barnes and Noble @ RIT
* Linux options for hardware with 400Mhz processors and 256MB of ram
